name: Cannon Boy
description:
Impress the crowd as Cannon Boy. Get launched from cannon to cannon in this addictive projectile arcade game. Tap and hold the screen to set the perfect angle and release to launch away. Be sure to make a perfect landing to gain double points. Collect gems along the way to unlock more features. Are you up for the challenge? Then, show the world your mad projectile skills!

Features:

*Unlockable characters

* Watch ad to gain more gems
